00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_ROBOTPART_CONTROL_IKOR_ROBOTSERIALMANIPULATOR_
00026 #define _ROBOT_ROBOTPART_CONTROL_IKOR_ROBOTSERIALMANIPULATOR_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/control/ikor/ikor>
00029 #include <robot/SerialManipulator>
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Object>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace robot {
00035 namespace control {
00036 namespace ikor {
00037 
00042 class RobotSerialManipulator : public robot::SerialManipulator
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   RobotSerialManipulator() : name("UNKNOWN"), joints(Parameters(0)) {}
00046   RobotSerialManipulator(const String s) : name( s ), joints(Parameters(0)) {}
00047   RobotSerialManipulator(const String s, const SInt nj) : name( s ), joints(Parameters(nj)) {}
00048   RobotSerialManipulator(const RobotSerialManipulator& r) {}
00049 
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("RobotSerialManipulator"); }
00051   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj RobotSerialManipulator(*this); }
00052 
00053   virtual String getName() const { return name; }
00054   virtual Int getNumberOfJoints() const { return joints.size(); }
00055 
00056   const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& getParameters() const;     
00057   const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters getJoint(Int i) const; 
00058 
00059   void setParameters(const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& p);           
00060   void setJoint(const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j, const Int i); 
00061 
00062 private:
00063   String name;
00064   Parameters joints;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j) // Output
00069 {
00070   switch(j.type){
00071   case SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Revolute:  
00072     out << "Revolute" << ",  " << j.alpha << ",  " << j.a << ",  " << j.d << ",  "  << "theta";
00073     break;
00074   case SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Prismatic:  
00075     out << "Prismatic" << ",  " << j.alpha << ",  " << j.a << ",  " << "d  " << ",  "  << j.theta;
00076     break;
00077   }
00078   return out;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const RobotSerialManipulator& rsm) // Output
00083   {
00084     SInt numJoints = rsm.getNumberOfJoints();
00085     out << 
00086       "\n" << rsm.className() << " Name: " << rsm.getName() << 
00087       "\n  Number of joints: " << numJoints << "\n";
00088     if (numJoints > 0) {
00089       out << "    joint (type,    alpha, a, d, theta)\n";
00090       for (SInt i = 0; i < numJoints; i++) {
00091         out << "      " << (i+1) << "   " <<  rsm.getJoint(i+1) << "\n" ;
00092       }  
00093     }
00094     return out;
00095   }
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const ref< RobotSerialManipulator>& rsm) // Output
00100   {
00101     SInt numJoints = rsm->getNumberOfJoints();
00102     out << 
00103       "\nRobotSerialManipulator Name: " << rsm->getName() <<
00104       "\n  Number of joints: " << numJoints << "\n";
00105     if (numJoints > 0) {
00106       out << "    joint (type,    alpha, a, d, theta)\n";
00107       for (SInt i = 0; i < numJoints; i++) {
00108         out << "      " << (i+1) << "   " <<  rsm->getJoint(i+1) << "\n" ;
00109       }  
00110     }
00111     return out;
00112   }
